QuestData.Title: Seek Out the Ashtongue
QuestData.Description: <As you look up at Xi'ri, your mind becomes focused and your will determined. Your work here is not done; you must go inside the Black Temple and find Akama's followers.>$B$B<Much depends on Akama's success.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Akama's Deathsworn inside the Black Temple.
QuestData.RewardText: We've been expecting you, $n. Akama is in great need of your help.
